mapper.select: select c.id,c.hot_title,p.id as pid,p.product_name, p.product_price,p.product_img from tb_hot_column c left join tb_product p on c.id=p.product_hot_id where p.product_flag = 1 order by c.id desc ,p.id desc
select id,product_name,product_desc,product_price,product_img,product_price_region from tb_product where product_flag = 2 and product_extra = 1 order by id desc

select p.id,product_name,product_img,pd.id as productDetailId, concat(pd.detail_name,'+',pd.detail_size,'+',pd.detail_taste) as detailType from tb_product_detail pd left join tb_product p on p.id=pd.product_id where p.product_extra = 0 and p.product_flag = 1 order by p.id desc limit 1
